ðŸ“– Summary: The gpui-component repository provides a collection of cross-platform UI components for building desktop applications using the GPUI framework. It offers a range of features, including customizable themes, flexible layouts, virtualized lists and tables for high performance, and support for Markdown, HTML, charting, and code highlighting. An experimental WebView component is also available.
